column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ For the Better Environment in Phnom Penh! On the morning of August 3
column5: citizens and monks of Por Sen Chey District
column8: with the participation of the District Police and Cintri had a cleanup along National Road 4 from Chom Chao roundabout to the traffic light.------Under the theme “Together for the Environment” 150 Chompor Von monks were a colourful sight as they cleaned trash from the street.------The Governor of Por Senchey District appealed to all citizens
column9: vendors and people to take keep the area free from garbage. (*Submitted to CNE viaFacebook)
